message.body: just got off w/ dad. sounded old but not exceptionally elderly or tired. was vague about how he was feeling. i told him i was gonna spend the night. he said that he had some stuff in the house he wants me to do.

i guess u werent able 2 find out if he ate -Dad called me a lil after 6 - said he got ur msg. When i asked if he had been laying down he snapped at me he didnt kno i left msg 3hrs ago. Is that good that he wants ur help since ur stayin over?
no - about food. yes - about help.
Then im extra glad - thats very cool of u. Also cool u have netbook?
Let me kno when ur leaving tucson - i would think dads ready 4 a tj's dark choc bar by now if ur picking up naan b4 heading up mtn
